website_summaries.verdict: This universal-fit cover protects just about any push mower from weather such as UV rays, mold, rain, sun and dirt.
pros: Handy storage bag for the cover keeps it put away when not needed
Protects against dust, pollen, and debris
Company offers a 30-day return period for a full refund
cons: A defective seam leaked on some lawn mower covers

customer_reviews.title: Having tried thinner and cheaper covers with poor results, I couldn't be happier than I am ...
customer_reviews.text: I have three mowers that are stored outside. These covers live up to their names. They are thick and tough. They fit the two Craftsman and Cub Cadet 21 and 22" mowers with the bag attached to the Cub Cadet. We've had them for several months and they have gone through several severe storms and rain events of two to three inches. They haven't budged and the mowers are kept bone dry. I do tuck the covers under wheels to keep them secure. Having tried thinner and cheaper covers with poor results,I couldn't be happier than I am with these covers.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Wyrick

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: I used this cover for the very first time on a $300 brand new push lawnmower. During the first week of thinking my new lawnmower was being protected from 2 rain storms this week I couldn't be more wrong and angry. The cover was still tucked in tight and just like I left it before the rain but when I removed the cover today to cut grass my BRAND NEW LAWNMOWER was entirely covered with water, engine and all with a good amount puddled up on the deck. I just might as well not even covered it up, the rain went right through this piece of junk Tough Cover.
customer_reviews.author: George T Smith

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY Recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Extremely WELL made lawn mower cover. My mower is left outdoors and subject to high heat temperatures and rain. This is the ONLY cover which has show to protect my mower and withstand the weather extremes just noted. The FIT is also a plus, the portion which covers the handle is specifically made to FIT this area and wind will not move this portion of the cover off of your mower. HIGHLY Recommend this product! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Barrientes

customer_reviews.title: Check out the guarantee that comes with this mower covers and then buy it, you'll be amazed!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lawnmower cover!!! It is wonderful!!! It is huge!!! I think it would fit almost any mower out there. I am so pleased because it covers my mower completely and protects it from the elements. Just remember to put the cover on your mower's handle first and then pull it down over your mower. I roll my mower forward after tucking the cover under the front wheels. This cover is heavy duty and easy to use. The guarantee is absolutely amazing!!! This is a must have if you own a mower!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kkat007

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality cover that is made of marine fabric. The cover allows for the fabric to be cinched snuggley around the wheels The cover was immediately put to the test in a rain storm with 50 mph winds and held up beautifully. It is a new cover and the test of time is now all that is left to judge just how good this cover is. I am happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Hit Man Hearne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected quality. I hate returning inferior products even tho Amazon's return policy is a great service. So glad this large and we'll made cover was exactly what I needed. The cover that slips over the handle bars and controls is designed like a pillow cover. If you store your mower outside, slipping this part on first helps prevent high winds from blowing off the cover. After l placed the cover over the mower, I then folded the handles forward to save storage space -- still fits great. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: John H. M.

customer_reviews.title: Too big and draw string doesn't work well.
customer_reviews.text: This mower cover is huge. I have a standard length mower and this over is about a foot too long. The draw strap also does not work well and seems to only tighten one area. I would never buy it again and encourage you to avoid this produce as you will end up needing bungie cords to ensure it fits and holds properly. Complete waste of my money. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Totally Waterproof and Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this cover for almost 4 months. Florida downpours, wind and rain, all handled without any problems. Mower was dry even after a full day of tropical rain. The fit is perfect for my Honda self-propelled mower. The cover is not a flat square, but a fitted cover that sleeves over the handlebars of the mower down to the rear wheels. Very secure. I roll the front wheels over the bit of extra fabric in front and it’s snug as can be. Huge upgrade from previous tarps and canvas makeshift covers I’ve used in the past. Well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. Very sturdy and fits well on two ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Very sturdy and fits well on two different types of lawnmowers. It could only be improved by a strap attaching on the underside to keep it fastened during high winds. It was put to the test earlier this week during 85 mile an hour winds. It became a bit Ozlike and found it's way to a friendly neighbor's house. It is now safely back home with the extra fabric in the front tucked under the front wheels.
customer_reviews.author: izzy coupon

customer_reviews.title: Defective design= garbage
customer_reviews.text: Defective design collects water and funnels it onto the mower inside. There is a seam where the top of the mower is that is not water proof and this lets in rain water. One small rainshower and my mower was soaked. Utter garbage
customer_reviews.author: Ipomo

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be very well made. The cover fits our Toro lawn mower very well. We've been using it for about 6 months now and haven't noticed any weathering, like fading or cracking. It's not getting a full test as we do keep the mower on the side yard which is naturally a little more protected from the sun and I do live in SoCal so there is less rain and no snow by the beach so normal wear and tear is much lighter. So it should last for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: B. Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My lawnmower was kept in the basement and it was causing back problems trying to lug it up out of the basement by myself. I purchased this cover so that I could leave it outside during the summer months. So far it’s been excellent! Large size that covers the mower and the bag. Ready to use. No water is getting through. It’s doing the job. Very pleased thus far!
customer_reviews.author: CDB

customer_reviews.title: Tough Cover
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly for my EGO LM2102SP lawn mower. I live in the New England area and am storing it outside (without battery). No issues yet. *knock on wood* The material is nice and thick. It feels very durable to me, kind of similar to canvas, but it's marine polyester (same stuff used for boat covers, duffel bags, etc.). It slips over the lawnmower handle and drapes over the front. My mower is pretty good size and this still allows some extra space. I do tuck the cover under the wheels which is nice to keep it nice and tight. Overall great cover. A+
customer_reviews.author: Mike Simonds

customer_reviews.title: Nice  cover !
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, nice material, easy to get on and off, logo helps you know what end is up and is big enough to cover the whole mower with room to spare. Looked like it was going to be to big but when I used the pull cord on the bottom of the cover it fits great. Had some heavy storms high wind and driving rain, cover stays on and the mower stays dry. Only thing is the cord to pull the cover tight around the bottom lays on the ground so you have to tuck it out of the way, I used a tarp clip to attach it to the cover to keep it off the ground
customer_reviews.author: Wm  Jameson

customer_reviews.title: Protects our Mower
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about this product? We live in SoCalifornia and because of limited room, we have to store our lawn mower outside. We considered building a small shed to house the mower, but, then found this cover for it. What an outstanding solution! The cover is substantial and covers our mower completely. A great purchase. We could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Sekhmet2

customer_reviews.title: ToughCover not disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a new mower I just bought. The parts that covers the handles fits perfect. The part that fits over the engine and body of the more a some extra material. It has a draw string that encircles the bottom of the mower. Once the draw string is pulled tight you still have enough material that can be tucked under the front wheels. All in all it is made of good material. The stitching has no flaws. It has rained on it no water got thru. I would probably buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Blackmoon1

customer_reviews.title: Wish I Had Ordered This Last Year
customer_reviews.text: Last year I made the mistake of ordering a different lawnmower cover. By the end of the summer season it was in shreds, did not stand up to the heat, sun and wind here at all. Very thin material. The difference in quality here is very noticeable. This is a good strong thick material and I was very pleased with it as soon as I unwrapped the package. Fast shipping also. I could have saved myself money and had a better product if I had ordered this one last year!
customer_reviews.author: Melly

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Lawn Mower Cover
customer_reviews.text: This heavy duty cover completely covers my mower and resists any wind that may try to lift it off. The tight design that envelopes the front and back side of of the handle top to bottom will allow me to park this mower outside all summer. The size of the body that goes around the engine and deck is a little too large for my mower and the draw string does not help much. But I have used elastic straps to affix a tighter fit. All in all this is one very heavy cover that will protect the entire mower from weather and UVA rays.
customer_reviews.author: Paintslinger

customer_reviews.title: Substantial Cover!!
customer_reviews.text: This lawn mower cover arrived quickly and in perfect condition. It is super heavy duty and would fit a mower of any size. It is much more substantial in material and coverage than my last cover, so I think it will last through the Pacific Northwest winters much longer.
customer_reviews.author: G. Talbot

customer_reviews.title: Product as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping on ordered product. Fit my Husqvarna mower very well, although the drawstring tie around the wheel area is a struggle. Item covers mower as described, seems well made and durable so far. Been through two heavy rainstorms since installing it on the mower, water beaded on cover exterior and ran off, when I took it off I noted no water on my mower or inside of cover. I am a satisfied customer this far, cover is doing just what I expected it to and as was advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Hook026

customer_reviews.title: Best small investment
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for 2 years. It is all that and a bag of chips. It has kept my lawn mower covered and protected from rain wind u name it. It's very water resistant. The color faded but who cares. The function is excellent. I dont have a shed so I keep my mower on my uncovered patio and it has kept it dry and untouched. It will prob be good for years to come and if for some odd reason it gets damaged I'll buy it again. It's easy to slip on and off. And u can spray it down with the hose when u need to. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I immediately thought that I would like to review the cover from just the appearance. The cover reeked of high quality from the moment that I opened the package which is a rarity today. I could tell that it was not cheaply made with cheap material and just thrown together which assured me that it would be durable. I am one who would love to purchase items where one seems to take pride in what they make to sell. I sure wish that the seller would make more quality items because they are very much needed. Thank you to Mom & Son for caring!
customer_reviews.author: nephish

customer_reviews.title: Mower cover
customer_reviews.text: the cover is made of heavy material and seems well made. I have 2 lawn mowers since I don't like to hump my small wheel rear drive Honda up the stairs to do my back yard. Only have room for one mower in my shed so the back yard mower lives outside. It is more than big enough for my 21 inch push mower and would big on even my 22 inch self propelled Honda. The bag is a nice extra and I will store the cover in it in the winter when I do get the mower out of the weather.
customer_reviews.author: pk

customer_reviews.title: Well made! Excellent fit on my Honda mower.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Fits perfectly. I had to store my mower outside for a month in the Fall while my garage was going through a transformation. Was stressed about it raining on my mower. Once I received it, I unpacked it, slipped it on and viola! - protected mower! I kept it on when moved the mower into the garage for winter and will keep using it each winter from now in on. It’s one of those purchases you pat yourself on the back for making. 😀
customer_reviews.author: Eva D.

customer_reviews.title: Works the way I'd expect it to.
customer_reviews.text: So far this seems to keep the rain out, the spiders seem to like building their egg sacks on it as well. It isn't super heavy, seems kind of "thin" to be a premium cover, but it does keep the rain off. My mower is a little smaller than the cover, which is ok but the rain pools in it. But that isn't a big deal for me. I just wish it was a little heavier that I could leave my mower outside during the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Cupidsmyth

customer_reviews.title: It seem to be pretty good material
customer_reviews.text: It seem to be pretty good material, time will tell. I bought this for my Troy built push mower with grass catcher. It fits the mower perfectly. I gave this a 4star, due to the drawstring is under the bag and it makes it hard to get to. They need to put it somewhere that's more convenience, like on the side or front of the mower.
customer_reviews.author: 2015 Taco

customer_reviews.title: Nice material. Looks like it will hold up for a good while.
customer_reviews.text: Plenty large enough for most walk-behind machines. Haven’t had it long enough to know what the water resistance is, but the material itself looks to be plenty tough. **Note: this cover does not have a drawstring around the bottom of it. I mistook the mention of a drawstring bag, (that the cover comes in), as meaning there is a drawstring around the base of the cover. There isn’t one. Even so, there was plenty of material to tuck under the wheels and around everything to help keep it secure.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi Henderson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRICE & GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This fits my Honda Lawnmower PERFECTLY with room to spare so I can push the mower forward after putting this on and it runs over the front just enough to keep it snug. It's so form-fitting I think it would fit just about any push lawnmower. It is SUPER durable and I know from the quality this will last FOR YEARS in our extreme Utah weather! Thanks for making this available and for a great price too!!
customer_reviews.author: LyndaZP

customer_reviews.title: Not wind proof?
customer_reviews.text: Blew away in the first storm. There were no included instructions, and I thought I had cinched it enough to have it stay, but it didn't. I couldn't get it to cinch down much at all. The material was thick and looked well-made, but I am really sad that I apparently didn't put it on well enough to stay. I'd give the product 4 stars, but with no instructions or anything- or an easy cinching mechanism, I'll have to go down to two. I really needed it, and I don't want to have to spend more money on another.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda DeBirk

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: We have a small outdoor shed that was too crowded. This very well made cover was our answer to finding more space. Now our mower is protected and can be stowed in another area without a worry of it being exposed to the elements. Thank you to Emma and Mark for designing the perfect lawn mower cover. It fit like a it was custom made. We are more than happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KCDahlia

customer_reviews.title: Great & Durable for outdoor protection
customer_reviews.text: Great product covering my mower stored outside year round. First cover lasted 2.5 years. I am now replacing it with another tough cover. Tried another well rated product beginning with an ‘H’ that was not even close to this product in weatherproof quality. I do wrap motor/ engine with plastic trash bag as additional protection. Mower has started up on 1-3 pulls last 2.5 years
customer_reviews.author: P Dud

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and really works
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased an electric lawn mower an ordered this cover to protect it from the elements. I put it on the day after it arrived and not a moment too soon as it rained the next day. The cover fit perfectly, covered everything and protected my mower from the rain. I wish I had known about this cover when I purchased my first lawn mower, it might have lasted longer. Great purchase ad well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nori

customer_reviews.title: What an AMAZING LAWN MOWER COVER!!
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved this cover and put it on our new mower, the quality and durability blow me away! This cover is thick and well put together, it actually covers the entire mower and it has elastic that you pull tight so the cover sits snuggly on the mower and wont blow off at all. If i would have known about this product before i would have bought it then. I love this so much i will be purchasing a couple more,not just for me but for family. This wont disappoint you and so worth the money. I most definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: cathi N.

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy - Should cover any lawn mower
customer_reviews.text: My second purchase of this cover. One thing to understand is that it is large enough to cover most any size lawnmower. It has lots of extra room for my old 18" and still has extra room for my new 21" self-propelled EGO with the grass catcher attached. Thick and the water resistance held up through the first thunderstorm downpour. Think it will last for several years.
customer_reviews.author: West Coast Harold

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing quality
customer_reviews.text: I must revise my original review of "We have only had this for a couple of days but I can tell that is is very well made and will be much more durable than the one it replaced." I have now had it for less than a year (May 2017), and it has come apart in several places. I kept this on the shaded side of our shed and it stayed dry for the most part. I have repaired it with Gorilla duct tape and hope that it will hold for another year or so. I am disappointed with this product and cannot recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Cubfanbob

customer_reviews.title: Big surprise.
customer_reviews.text: This was a big surprise, I wanted a cover for my new lawn mower, couldn't afford the Honda brand so thought I would get something a little more affordable. Well, my Tough Cover arrived, and surprise, surprise, I don't need to bother with Honda, this is awesome. The cover is made of a very substantial fabric and covers my mower with room to spare. Very surprised to find such a high end item at such a reasonable price. Sure wish Tough Cover made snowblower covers, I would be first in line.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof, fits nicely
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Got it in time for the Nor'easter in RI. Lots of rain and wind. The cover stayed on and the lawnmower stayed dry. A nice fit. Because of the material this cover is made from, I cannot see it ripping like one I previously purchased a copy of years ago because of the sun bleaching it out. I am happy that I purchased this cover.
customer_reviews.author: EastCoast

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, heavy duty, waterproof, large (!).
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, heavy duty waterproof material. The cover is actually oversized for the basic push from behind power mower and the design fully covers the entire mower and handle down to the ground with room to spare. This does require smoothing it out to prevent water pooling, and the drawstring is not necessary -- which is good as it is hard to draw. The storage bag is nice and most folk will find something else to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: JCS

customer_reviews.title: I just got it, but this is *nice*
customer_reviews.text: I keep my mower in an old storage building. I don't really trust the out building to not leak occasionally so I wanted a cover for it. The Honda cover was CRAZY expensive. $60 or so. This cover looked like a higher quality option for a lot cheaper, so I pulled the trigger. I'm glad I did. I can tell this is of really good quality. I think it will keep my mew Honda mower safe for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: DCT

customer_reviews.title: Heavier duty lawn mower cover.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best covers I have bought over the years . It is a heavier weight then the others , very good quality . I have just purchased & placed on my mower for the up coming winter . I really can't say how it will be by next year at this time , but am very pleased with the quality , & pricing ! I have a Toro walk along mower and it was roomy for my mower ...
customer_reviews.author: Jaque

customer_reviews.title: A heavy cover, but...
customer_reviews.text: Received this cover in April 2018, and by August it is very badly fading from the sun, having been moved to a full sun location in June. Will see how it fares over the winter and will update this review then. The fabric seems heavy enough and it does fit nicely and somewhat loose over my Husqvarna all wheel drive mower. I was initially pleased by the cover, but the amount of fading detracts from the appearance and is a little disconcerting after just four months. If it holds together being in the sun until November and then semi-protected from the snowy winter weather, I'll consider it a value for the price and update rating to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wilbur

customer_reviews.title: Still protecting, great price, but starting to grey
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it's a good deal. Fits my Honda self-propelled well and it's easy to put on, remove and the fit is adequate. It sits in full sun for 8 months and has begun to grey, but it still working just fine. If I had a proper storage area to help shield from the sun, it would be perfect. But it has served its purpose well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Walker

customer_reviews.title: Over a year of usage now
customer_reviews.text: I keep my mower by the back of my home, exposed to the elements. This cover is amazing and does the job. My mower stays dry through all of the storms this year and snow and everything it's held up. When it was time to mow this year after my mower had sat under the cover all season, I pulled the tough cover off and it cranked right up!!! This thing works!
customer_reviews.author: BOOT

customer_reviews.title: Good protection for our new mower
customer_reviews.text: My husband asked me to please write a review for him. We bought this cover for our new lawn mower. We live in a very humid climate that is prone to tropical storms, and our mower is stored outside. It was important to us to find a cover to protect it. So far, it seems to be holding up really well and does what we bought it to do. I'll try to update later once we get to test it through a solid storm. Thank you for a good quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ott

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality, Should Fit Most Walk Behind Mowers
customer_reviews.text: This cover is of excellent quality and I expect many years of service. I have an average size walk behind mower but this cover appears to provide enough space to cover many much larger mowers. I live in Arizona so I am more concerned with sun protection than rain so I can't offer much in the way of water repellency but I expect it will work fine. Very high quality cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not WATERPROOF
customer_reviews.text: NOT WATERPROOF! The top part seems to be fine, but the bottom part of the mower was soaked. So it is not waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My lawn mower has been feeling neglected out in the cold weather this winter. The tarp I was using kept blowing off, defeating its purpose. This fit my self-propelled lawn mower perfectly. It slides over the handle and tucks around the base nicely. I feel better knowing my lawn mower isn't being exposed to harsh weather now. The material is thick and feels strong. Much better than a tarp.
customer_reviews.author: Pazz

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a Honda lawnmower and wanted the added protection of a cover. Saw two great reviews and order it. Super happy with it. The material is heavyweight and fits great. Love how it slides over the handle to a sure it won’t blow away and give added protection. As a side note, love that it’s a “mom and son” business.
customer_reviews.author: Brian P.

customer_reviews.title: I like this cover since it allows me to keep my ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this cover since it allows me to keep my mower outside instead of hauling it inside my shed after each use. I only wish the cover had an elastic bottom to hug around the mower rather than hanging loose.
customer_reviews.author: JQ

customer_reviews.title: Great Coverage and Durable Material
customer_reviews.text: This cover is perfect for my mower. I don't have any storage so my mower is on my back porch. The rain would get the motor wet so I decided to purchase this cover. Super easy to install and it even has a drawstring to give it a tight snug fit. Durable material and easy to clean if it gets dirty, just hose off and allow to dry. Seems puncture durable also. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara C.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed at how well this thing protects my lawnmower. We have had a lot of heavy rain and strong winds this spring and this cover has held up very well. The material hasn't shown any wear or molding and the lawnmower stays dry! I tuck the wheels under the edge of the cover to keep it from blowing around and it seems to work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Ozmun

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made and fits the lawnmower.
customer_reviews.text: Fits our lawnmower very well and looks nice too. I didn’t want to store the lawnmower in the garage any more so the compromise was to find a cover and keep it on the side of the house. I think my husband was surprised that I came up with one that fits. After putting it on the lawnmower he commented on how nice it was. It didn’t seem expensive for the quality and if it weathers it would be worth buying again. I am just happy to have the space back in my garage.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: Water resistant and attractive mower cover
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover and it fits snugly over the whole mower - a Troy Bilt 130xp (22 inches wide across the front of the mower from wheel to wheel). The material seems waterproof and water beads up and rolls off when it rains. It looks nice having something fitted over the mower, especially compared to a tarp etc. Have only had the cover for about a week, so can't speak to the durability over time yet.
customer_reviews.author: jmd

customer_reviews.title: Good cover. Will see how it holds up..
customer_reviews.text: Great cover so far. Seems durable and well made. 600D fabric is not the heaviest material but pretty standard at this price. Skirt drapes down to the ground a little longer than expected. Will have to see how it holds up to Texas weather but happy so far. Not sure why the cover comes with its own cover for storage but again that's no big deal. They could have just shaved off a couple bucks and not provided it.
customer_reviews.author: tank

customer_reviews.title: Tough, durable, protection!
customer_reviews.text: This lawnmower cover was purchased by me, for my husband. Our mower has been out in the weather for a couple of years and I hate watching it get hit with rain, snow, sun. The cover has only been on now for a couple of days and I’m thrilled! It fits perfectly, arrived on time, as expected and looks so much better put on our patio than the mower did without any protection!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Madsen

customer_reviews.title: Top quality & tough
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what it says - tough. Thick drapey material shaped to fit over a conventional shaped rotary mower. It has a drawstring at the bottom to keep it from blowing off, & so far is 100% waterproof. Slightly large for my 20" electric mower. Also had followup from manufacturer to ensure satisfaction. Well-designed shape that looks like it will fit a range of sizes, a big enough pocket at the back on the handle end so my grass clipping catcher can remain attached & covered, & a prominent logo on the top that makes it easy to orient when putting it back on the mower.
customer_reviews.author: cwinn

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as expected
customer_reviews.text: Material not as heavy as expected, also don't like the fact that the end of cover that fits over handle end of mower is completely sewn shut/enclosed about 1/2 of the length(like a pillowcase) so that you have to put cover on handle and keep pulling it down to cover rest of mower. This makes it too difficult/tedious to put on and take off. I have a Toro mower cover that is much heavier and waterproof and is easier to fit over mower because it has an adjustable belt with a click latch to secure it in back. Will probably keep this cover and use it on something else, as returning is a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Fits great but durability doubtful
customer_reviews.text: The cover fits perfectly over my lawnmower however I do not think that this cover is a “Tough Cover” if it has faded and the stitching has already taken place after three months of use. The lawn mover is only in the sun part of the day so I can’t recommend this product for it’s durability.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for seasonal outdoor coverage!
customer_reviews.text: Got tired of taking the electric lawn mower in and out of the cramped storage shed. This cover allowed me to store it outside, and it has held up to rains and to very viscous winds of 50+ mph. Tip - if you're going to use it in a windy area, be sure and tuck the extra material underneath the wheels and you'll be good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Ron T.

customer_reviews.title: Good Cover
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was extremely fast! I covered the mower today, love the material and I think it will do the job. Had a bit of rain today and the mower is still dry. The fit was a little large but I did as others did and just rolled the wheels over it to tuck it. For what I need it for it will serve the purpose, and I appreciate that Emma kept in touch throughout the order and delivery process.
customer_reviews.author: Sucker For Shoes

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and have great coverage
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was prompt and cover nice and heavy. Looks great (and so glad to have the old tarp gone and dusted). We don't have much weather where I live, but the material feels similar to what I have kept over my BBQ for many years now. Have full confidence in the cover and very glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: S. Small

customer_reviews.title: Seems durable and great quality
customer_reviews.text: This push lawn mower cover seems to be of great quality. It completely covers my lawn cover and has a draw-string to tighten the fit more if needed. The material looks tough and repels rain completely. It was easy to shape around and cover my lawn mower. I definitely would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: YesIcan

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for now, will update when it rains to see.
customer_reviews.text: Well as the title says, will update when it rains to see how it upholds but so far I love it. I got some good comments already on it, it's nice and big and the cover actually does cover your wheels idk why someone else said it didn't. It can even fit with them tucked in that's how big it is and that's coming from a hrc216 mower owner so no need to be afraid people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaking seams.  Don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak to durability or material quality too much as I just got the cover however, after more than 4 separate rain showers drying in between, I can speak about it's water resistance or lack there of. The main material is definitely waterproof as the water just beads off of it but the problem appears to be at the seams -on my cover at least. My mower is wet directly underneath anywhere there's a stitched seam. Totally unacceptable. A cheap tarp will serve you better. Just replace it every season or every other.
customer_reviews.author: Dan McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: #1 in my book!
customer_reviews.text: HEAVY DUTY, Great Fit, I wish I could buy a grill cover and pressure washing cover made by TOUGH COVER. They have named this cover Correctly!! I would rather have a grill cover made by TOUGH COVER than my WEBER cover. Honestly. HOPE TO SEE OTHER COVERS COMING. PLEASE.
customer_reviews.author: JFH

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those items you purchase realizing there’s a broad spectrum of fit and quality. This cover exceeded all my expectations. It’s designed to fit snuggly over the handle which also helps keep it in place. The bottom half is large enough to fit over any push mower. Tuck the edges under the wheels and forget about it. It’s been through several thunderstorms with nary a drop touching the mower. This is one of my Best buys on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Davies

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cover
customer_reviews.text: First of all this cover is well made from heavy fabric. It's extra large which makes it easy to put on. You can pull the extra fabric and tuck it under the front wheels which leaves it taught and pitched downwards. I don't know how many years I will get out of this, but I can't imagine an item of this type being any better.
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: This is so far has been great against the wind
customer_reviews.text: This is so far has been great against the wind. We did not have much rain so, I cannot say how good it will be yet. However, I'm only giving this 4 stars out of 5 because I cannot tie the cover up in my mower like in the photo. It is kinda big.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: So far great, time will tell.
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using this for a week but the cover appears to be very well made from quality fabric, and had been repelling the recent rains. So far I’m very satisfied but time will tell if it holds up under the fierce Texas sun and strong winds of this area- hopefully it will!
customer_reviews.author: sm

customer_reviews.title: Best lawnmower cover you can buy
customer_reviews.text: The name 'TouchCover' is completely accurate. This cover is made of really heavy, weatherproof material and actually cost less than the previous brand I had purchased which was made out of flimsy, much thinner material. If you're looking for quality, this is the one to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Thoroughly Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Let's be honest. How often do you think about the differences or quality of yard equipment covers? I am absolutely thrilled with how well this product works. I keep my mower underneath my deck as I don't have a shed to store it in, and wanted a solution to keeping it dry and clean while not in use. Through heavy rain, my mower has stayed dry, mold free, and clean. Being able to tighten it makes the fit customizable to any push mower. If you value taking care of your mower, this cover won't do you wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Water Resistant ... but NOT WaterPROOF! ...
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT Quality Construction / Material; yet Not Waterproof ... just "Resistant!" : ( ... Wish it was Waterproof; as it's very STURDY, Durable Material & Construction! BTW, as another SUGGESTION: Please place the "Compression Fit Cord" in the MIDDLE of the Front or Back of the Mower Cover ( ... I prefer the Front; easier to Fit the Cover - under the Front Wheels ... after tightening the Cord!)*
customer_reviews.author: Lady T.

customer_reviews.title: Not terrible
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the materials are good. It is durable and water resistant, but the drawstrings are junk. Im not sure why the even put them on. It covers my mower nicely but i have to use large stones on the corners to hold the cover on. Decent though if that doesn't matter to you or you just want it covered in your shed or garage.
customer_reviews.author: I buy stuff

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price. Nice coverage.
customer_reviews.text: Covers my 20 inch greenworks 40v battery operated lawn mower completely. My only complaint is that the draw string at the base doesn’t let you tighten that further. It’s not really a problem though. The quality of the material is good so the cover stays put and doesn’t blow around like a junky cover may.
customer_reviews.author: btt118

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to ouse and is a wonderful protection from all ...
customer_reviews.text: I received this lawnmower cover/protection wrap which I wanted so that I could leave my mower out and not have it sitting in rain and weather. I opened the pack and was able to put it on my mower in NO TIME! It is easy to ouse and is a wonderful protection from all the water here. It is exactly what I needed....I mean, what my mower needed!! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Donna M. Nikzi

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of space
customer_reviews.text: Large and drapes over our mower. My son forgot to allow the lawn mower to cool and burned in few holes near the bottom edges.
customer_reviews.author: Yo

customer_reviews.title: Kind of huge but does the job, useless drawstring
customer_reviews.text: One-size-fits-all, what they don’t tell you is that it’s kind of huge. It does the job, it’s just pretty baggy. The drawstring at the bottom doesn’t do anything. I couldn’t even use it, because when I tried to pull it it just bunched at the opening of the channel, without drawing anything together.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Toppa

customer_reviews.title: TOUGHCOVERS DO THE JOB INTENDED
customer_reviews.text: The ToughCovers I purchased were for a self propelled Craftsman 190cc 4-in-1 Chipper/Shredder 24" Yard Vacuum and a Cub Cadet walk behind (and push) lawn mower, Cub Cadet (21") 159cc Lawn Mower w/ Swivel Wheels. The lawn mower, by the way, is very poorly designed and constructed and difficult to use. The covers though seem well made and of a material that it seems reasonable to expect will have a respectable useful life. They are generously sized and when used properly protect the covered equipment as expected.
customer_reviews.author: PJD

customer_reviews.title: Looks great so far
customer_reviews.text: 8/4/19 have yet to be fully tested for the durability and quality. I will update review in a year. Once I left it outside in weather in the Texas, So far it looks great and covers all the handle assembly both top and bottom is fully in covered, and the base mower part has a draw string to hold it tight around the mower. For right now I give four stars.
customer_reviews.author: JMK

customer_reviews.title: It’s a total cover...wheels inside
customer_reviews.text: Returned bc I didn’t realize that the wheels go inside the cover thus preventing you from rolling it. Looked like sturdy material though
customer_reviews.author: Mary K.

customer_reviews.title: Tough Cover for lawn mower.
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using the cover for a month. Too soon to rate durability and material quality. Have yet to experience any wet weather and therefore can't comment on water resistance either. I own a Honda HRX 217HMA lawn mower and the cover does fit it nicely. It would be nice to have a way to secure the bottom front end for long term storage. Instead I'm having to put the front edge of the cover under the front wheels to keep it from blowing off from strong gusts of wind.
customer_reviews.author: KN

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking cover that is easy to fit, is durable and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: What caught my eye about this cover was the reasonable price, the color and that it is waterproof. I received it in a timely manner. It’s very durable, the material is very strong and it was very easy to fit on and over the lawnmower. It’s rained heavy twice since then and it has been confirmed to be waterproof. Because of the way the cover is designed and goes down the sides and underneath the top and over the bottom part of the mower, water does not get in from anywhere; very good product. I would recommend this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Spremulli

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be what is described but is brand new
customer_reviews.text: Appears to a high quality product and looks like it would fit almost any size push or self-propelled non-riding lawn mower. Mine is going to protect my new EGO. I always reserve super high ratings until I've had the item for a few months or a couple of seasons. We'll wait to see if my shed rodents turn this cover into mulch like so many others have...
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with product
customer_reviews.text: The material appears to be very tough without being stiff or hard to handle. Very generous in size easily covers the entire Husqvarna mower. Has already been waterproof in thunderstorms. Very happy with this product. Cannot yet comment on durability but the material is very strong.
customer_reviews.author: terpfan

customer_reviews.title: What an awesome lawnmower cover!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome lawnmower cover! The way that it appropriately drapes and covers all aspects of the mower is like nothing I've seen before. I've tried the OEM cover, and another generic cover, and this beats 'em all. I have a Honda HRR216 self-propelled mower; with the bag on, it covers it! I'm glad I purchased this cover!!
customer_reviews.author: VaRedSoxFan

customer_reviews.title: Great Secure Cover
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. I have to lug the mower in and out from the garage to the backyard, through my finished basement.. it’s a mess. Lazy on getting shed . Saw this, it’s perfect, cover the mover and leave it to the side on the concrete patio. Exactly what I needed and can’t believe I didn’t find it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: The only cover you should buy!
customer_reviews.text: The Tough Cover is by far the best lawnmower cover I’ve ever seen. Beyond that, they are a great company. Family-run business with incredible customer service. I’m using the cover for my brand new Honda walk behind mower. It’s way easier to use and a third of the price of the namebrand Honda cover. It’s slides right on and covers 100% of my mower. The material is marine-grade and far thicker than other mower covers.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Thornhill

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: I'll know more after a year, but this cover is very well made. It repels water great. It is very easy to put on and take off. It's a bit big for some mowers, but tuck the extra under the wheels and do not need any straps to hold it from the wind. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: speedbugy

customer_reviews.title: Fits the lawn mower perfectly. Easy to put on and take off and it Works!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent cover for our new lawn mower. Keeps the entire mower wheels and all covered. I highly recommend this cover and it stays on and comes off with ease. Our new lawn mower will last a lot longer with his high quality cover.
customer_reviews.author: J. Connor

customer_reviews.title: Best cover ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lawn mower cover, strong, durable, waterproof. The day after I received the cover, for my brand new lawn mower, it down poured for two days. Not a drop of rain or moisture on my lawn mower. I have a 21 inch craftsman. The cover is generous in size and has a draw pull. My wheels are even completely covered. As described by seller. Arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Heavy cover, great product.
customer_reviews.text: Received my cover, and the first thing I noticed was how heavy the fabric was. Well, the next day, we were hit with really bad thunderstorms. When I looked at my mower the next day, it was bone dry. Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to store my Husqvarna 22in push mower for the winter and it fit perfect. I was able to store attachments in the clippings bag and attach it to the mower. The cover fit well and I see no reason why it wouldn't protect it for several years.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Parrish

customer_reviews.title: bulletproof sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: There's really nothing to dislike, except cinching up the guide rope. This cover is bulletproof nylon -- way heavier than anything i've use as tent or ground cloth. i fell very confident it'll last through our winters -- rainy, ice and sometimes a little snow.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Jones

customer_reviews.title: As the saying goes, you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: These ToughCover mower covers are great The material seems to be very sturdy. They look nice. They cover the mowers very well. I have gone through several cheaper covers which just don't last. I have only had these for a short time but they seem like they will hold up very well. I guess time will tell but so far I am happy with this purchase. As always this was a smooth Amazon transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Hobee

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my mower dry
customer_reviews.text: I don't want my garage smelling like gas/grass, so I store my mower outside. This cover keeps it dry. There's a cord to tie the bottom closed, but mine snapped off the first time I tried to use it. I just tuck the bottom under the wheels - works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for outdoor storage.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for me. It is designed as a large sleeve that incases the handle with a large open end that covers the mower. while it does not have any tie downs I have found it is long enough that if I stuff the extra under the front wheels it does not blow off. I gave it 5 stars because for what it is it does rate as such, while it is not 20lb water proof canvas, etc. It has held up wonderfully, so far through several storms of 15-20 mph winds. Highly recommend this cover.
customer_reviews.author: daveh

customer_reviews.title: New cover for grandfathers mower
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover to replace my grandfather’s original craftsman cover to his mower because it was old and ragged. I delivered it to him and visited he was very pleased with the new cover and it fit his mower well thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mr T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Workable Generic Lawn Mower Cover
customer_reviews.text: This lawn mower cover certainly serves the purpose. We've only had it about a month, so that's why the 4 stars on the features. So far, so good though. Material quality seems to be very good. We'll see what happens when we store the lawn mower with this cover on during the coming winter! I have had some problems with the draw string closing all the way around, but I'm able to tuck the excess material well under the mower. So far, that seems to be good enough protection from the few summer rains we've had.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: This is a good water proof cover for your lawn mower.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this on my mower all winter. Very durable fabric and water proof. My 21 inch Snapper was easily covered. I keep my mower outside under my deck all winter. This is a good product. I recommend it to anyone looking to keep weather off your mower.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had very long, but fits well and seems to be made very well with quality material. Only thing I can see wrong is that it should have a way to tighten all corners instead of one corner. Otherwise, seems very nice
customer_reviews.author: jtree412

product_meta.title: ToughCover Premium Waterproof Lawn Mower Cover Heavy Duty 600D Marine Grade Fabric. Universal Fit. Weather, UV & Mold Protection. with Drawstring Storage Bag.
product_meta.description:
The walk-behind lawn mower cover by ToughCover has been designed with longevity in mind. Constructed of heavy-duty 600D marine-grade fabric with double-stitched seams and interior waterproof coating, our cover will protect your investment for years to come.

TIPS FOR CHOOSING A HIGH-QUALITY MOWER COVER

FABRIC TYPE: Fabric strength is determined by a “Denier” number. Denier (abbreviated D), is a unit of measure for the mass density of fibers. Simply put, the higher the denier number, the stronger the fabric. Many mower covers are made with 300D, 200D, or even 150D fabric, which is a much less durable material. Our 600D fabric is robust enough to withstand the harshest environment.

COVER WEIGHT: Compare the item weight when shopping for a new cover. A cover made with thin, flimsy material will be very light. At 2.5 lbs, the lawn mower cover by ToughCover is one of the heaviest, most durable covers on the market.

WARRANTY: We stand behind our 12-month unconditional warranty and take pride in offering unparalleled customer service. If you ever have any issues or questions regarding your cover purchase, just contact us and we’ll take care of it!

Product Features:
600D marine grade fabric
Double stitched seams
Interior waterproof coating
Universal fit
Bonus storage bag

Our lawn mower cover can be used for popular models from brands such as Craftsman, Honda, Husqvarna, Toro, John Deere and more, as it provides enough room to store even the largest mowers currently on the market!
feature_bullets: KEEP YOUR MOWER IN TIP-TOP SHAPE: Cover the ENTIRETY of your mower’s surface while in storage.
UNIVERSAL FIT, EASY TO USE: Suitable for all types, models & makes of push, gas, & electric mowers!
600D MARINE-GRADE FABRIC: This heavy duty, tear-resistant material is the best of its kind.
WATER, UV & MOLD RESISTANT: Protect your prized mower safe from dust, pollen and debris.
100% MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE: Return your cover for any reason within 30 days and get a full refund of the purchase price.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars2,560 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
